content.description: Sit start with hands matched in the large hueco. From there, stick a hueco with the right hand, heel hook the start hold, pull up with the left to a great edge, top it out.
content.protection: A pair of pads will be fine. The landing is flat and clear.
content.location: It climbs the east section of the boulder's south face.

content.description: Starting with a right side pull and a left sloper, along with a heel hook and toe, move upward on a crimp then bump to a two finger pocket. Bump again to a three finger pocket. Move your right hand to a pinch and move up to top out.
content.protection: A couple of pads should do the trick.
content.location: The problem is located on the north face of the Leave No Trace Boulder. There's a downclimb on the east side. The right hand pinch is really obvious in the middle of the face.

content.description:
Boom Flow climbs a slight overhang on pockets and edges.

Sit start with a left hand three-finger pocket and a right hand pinch-edge. From there, crank up to a right hand sidepull pocket, stick a good left hand pocket, then follow the features to the lip to an easy mantle.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is very good.
content.location:
It climbs just left of

Pack It Out

on the boulder's north face.
